name: UpgradeBeaconController
description: UpgradeBeaconController. This implementation is a minimal version inspired by 0age's implementation: https://github.com/dharma-eng/dharma-smart-wallet/blob/master/contracts/upgradeability/DharmaUpgradeBeaconController.sol. Set as the controller of UpgradeBeacon contract(s), capable of changing their stored implementation address.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: upgrade
functionDecorators.description: Modify the implementation stored in the UpgradeBeacon, which will upgrade the implementation used by all Proxy contracts using that UpgradeBeacon.

parameterDecorators.name: _beacon
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the UpgradeBeacon which will be updated.

parameterDecorators.name: _implementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the Implementation contract to upgrade the Beacon to.
